daily_summary.headline: Aurora Opportunities and Routine Launches Dominate the Day

top_events.title: Aurora Viewing Opportunity
top_events.description: A G1 geomagnetic storm is expected, providing potential aurora visibility at high latitudes.
top_events.action: Check viewing conditions if you're at high latitudes.

top_events.title: Routine Starlink Launch
top_events.description: SpaceX Falcon 9 will launch another batch of Starlink satellites.
top_events.action: Watch the live stream for the launch.

top_events.title: Firefly Alpha Test Flight
top_events.description: Firefly Alpha's test flight for system validation.
top_events.action: Monitor for updates on this test flight.

opportunities.recommendation: Possible aurora at high latitudes. Best for northern locations (65°+). Worth checking if conditions are optimal.
